snow.player

接口 PlayerStateListener

  • 所有超级接口:
    Player.OnBufferedProgressChangeListener, Player.OnPlaybackStateChangeListener, Player.OnPlayingMusicItemChangeListener, Player.OnPlaylistChangeListener, Player.OnPlayModeChangeListener, Player.OnPrepareListener, Player.OnRepeatListener, Player.OnSeekCompleteListener, Player.OnStalledChangeListener

    public interface PlayerStateListener
extends Player.OnPlaybackStateChangeListener, Player.OnPrepareListener, Player.OnStalledChangeListener, Player.OnBufferedProgressChangeListener, Player.OnPlayingMusicItemChangeListener, Player.OnSeekCompleteListener, Player.OnPlaylistChangeListener, Player.OnPlayModeChangeListener, Player.OnRepeatListener

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onShutdown()
      当服务端准备关闭时会回调该方法，此时客户端应主动断开与服务端的连接。

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnPlaybackStateChangeListener

        onError, onPause, onPlay, onStop

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnPrepareListener

        onPrepared, onPreparing

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnStalledChangeListener

        onStalledChanged

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnBufferedProgressChangeListener

        onBufferedProgressChanged

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnPlayingMusicItemChangeListener

        onPlayingMusicItemChanged

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnSeekCompleteListener

        onSeekComplete

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnPlaylistChangeListener

        onPlaylistChanged

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnPlayModeChangeListener

        onPlayModeChanged

      • 从接口继承的方法 snow.player.Player.OnRepeatListener

        onRepeat

    • 方法详细资料

      • onShutdown

        void onShutdown()
        当服务端准备关闭时会回调该方法，此时客户端应主动断开与服务端的连接。
